name: Servant of Thrones
summary:
A game where you play cards to summon creatures that will move towards the other player to attack their buildings or fight with the monsters they summoned. 
There are 2 ground lanes and some creatures can fly straight to the buildings. 
The goal is to destroy the tower in the lane then the main building of the other player. 
If the time runs out the person who destroyed the most towers wins or it goes to a sudden death mode.
